title: Diamond Leaf Manga Tikka Pendant - Modern Minnu Bottu
features: Contemporary interpretation of the classic Mango (Manga) design. Features a meticulously crafted leaf motif encrusted with pave-set diamonds. The design incorporates swirling gold details on the ends of the pendant. High-polish finish for enhanced brilliance.
colors: Rose gold and sparkling white diamonds.
occasions: and festive occasions. Can also be worn as a stylish pendant for everyday wear.
description: A modern take on a traditional South Indian symbol. The pave setting maximizes the brilliance of the diamonds, creating a captivating sparkle. Exquisite craftsmanship ensures durability and lasting value. This pendant seamlessly blends cultural heritage with contemporary style.
